ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 4
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 4: Jason confronts Two-Face, whom he learns is the secret head of Task Force Z, and Harvey reveals to Jason some of the secrets of the project. As Amanda Waller arrives to shut down the project, Jason leads the team and discovers another project that is strangely similar to Task Force Z.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 20:07:35. [CVDB904506] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:50:11. [Issue ID 2302619]
